markdownRemark.excerpt: Disk usage analisis by   linux utility. Install   on Debian/Ubuntu linux: Example usage:
markdownRemark.html:
Disk usage analisis by ncdu linux utility. Install ncdu on Debian/Ubuntu linux:

sudo apt-get install ncdu -y

Example usage:

ncdu you-directory
